search_01_003/4301_1001_0100_10:
Perfecto! My, my! You’re really getting the
hang of how Pokémon battles work here!
search_01_003/4301_1001_0200_10:
I’m glad I was able to observe you up close
today. This impromptu fieldwork has been
so helpful!
search_01_003/4301_1001_0300_10:
To create an even playing field, we’ve given
every sync pair their own Poryphone to use
while here on Pasio.
search_01_003/4301_1001_0400_10:
Since each Poryphone contains a sync stone,
everyone has the ability to use sync moves.
search_01_003/4301_1001_0500_10:
And as I explained before, as your bond with
your Pokémon grows, your sync strength
as partners grows, too.
search_01_003/4301_1001_0600_10:
I’ll be sure to share any new and helpful
information I come across as I continue
my research, OK?
search_01_003/4301_1001_0700_10:
For now, I think our fieldwork is complete!
Danke very much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Ta-ta!
